item.title: Bette Chamberlin – Alexander Technique
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
Bette Chamberlin is an Alexander Technique instructor working out of her studio in Upper Montclair, New Jersey. Alexander Technique gives the body freedom of movement, balance, support and coordination. We wanted to show a body that was liberated from tension and habit, which was the inspiration for this logo. The post Bette Chamberlin – Alexander Technique appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
Bette Chamberlin is an Alexander Technique instructor working out of her studio in Upper Montclair, New Jersey. Alexander Technique gives the body freedom of movement, balance, support and coordination. We wanted to show a body that was liberated from tension and habit, which was the inspiration for this logo. Bette also comes from a dance background so we wanted to show the figure in a more animated position.

Visual Identity

Results

Thanks for all you and Teresa have done on my website. I am sure that 80% of my business has come through it!
-Bette Chamberlin

bettechamberlin.com
